title: What happened to CC314?
content:
I wasn't here, but I know for a while now that CC314 has been down...


Does anyone know when or why it crashed?~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...

title: Re: What happened to CC314?
content:
Hmmm, so it seems. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img]

Not a word has been said about it, so I really don't know.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: What happened to CC314?
content:
Flaose was pretty much running the site single-handedly, so when he left early last year CC314 pretty much stopped. Cho'gall is apparently moving it to cc314.com, but there hasn't been any progress yet.

(edit: typowned :P)

title: Re: What happened to CC314?
content:
I waited a bit posting this to see if it'd come back, but it didn't, so...

Most of it is still online I'm sure.
The splash page is, but then the frames are down, making the site completely useless default-navigation-wise.
Pages like the maps are up though, leading me to believe it's probably actually just 1 or 2 pages that are down, nothing more.Retodon8
Sheep happens! [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Keen/Graphics/K1_nme_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]
